plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Cows like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 Animals eat me in a field.

plant.question: I am tall and have a trunk. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐿️ Squirrels love to climb on me.

plant.question: I am round and red and grow on a plant. You can eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🥪 You can put me on a sandwich.

plant.question: I am yellow and you peel me before you eat me. Monkeys like to eat me too! What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I am the color of the sun.

plant.question: I have pretty colors and smell nice. Bees like to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 💐 People give me as a gift.

plant.question: I am long and orange and grow in the ground. Rabbits like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 👁️ Some people say I help you see better.

plant.question: I am green and grow on a vine. I'm juicy and you can eat me right off the vine. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I am often purple or green.
🍷 I can be made into juice.
🧺 You get a bunch of me.

plant.question: I am yellow and covered in kernels, and grow inside a husk. You can eat me on the cob. What am I?

hints.text: 👨‍🌾 Farmers plant me in a field.

plant.question: I am a big, round fruit with a green rind and red inside. I am very juicy! What am I?

hints.text: 🏖️ I'm a good fruit to eat in summer.

plant.question: I am a brown seed that grows on a plant. You can grind me up and make a hot drink. What am I?

hints.text: ☕ Adults often drink me in the morning.

bug.question: I am small and black, and I march in a line. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am a very tiny worker
🛣️ You often see me on the ground.

bug.question: I have spots and I can fly, what am I?

hints.text: 🪴 I like to land on plants.

bug.question: I can fly and make a buzzing sound, what am I?
I jump very high. What am I?
I have many legs and crawl on the ground. What am I?

hints.text: 🏘️ I live under rocks and logs.
💯 My name sounds like it has 100 of my walking parts.

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar and become a beautiful flier. What am I?

hints.text: 🌸 I like to drink nectar from flowers.
🐛 I begin my life crawling around.

bug.question: I make a sticky web. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I catch my food in the web.
🏡 Some people are scared of me but I'm not really scary!

bug.question: I glow at night. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I light up in the dark.
🌃 I am also called a lightning bug.

bug.question: I have a long body with many segments, and I curl up when scared. What am I?

hints.text: 💊 I look like a small pill when I roll up.
🛡️ My rolled up form is like armor.

bug.question: I make a buzzing sound and sometimes I bite you. What am I?

hints.text: 🦟 I have a long, thin mouth.
💦 I like to live near water.
